article.title: Raytheon Awarded $12.2 Million Miniature Air Launched Decoy-Jammer Study Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Raytheon Company has been awarded a $12.2 million contract by the U.S. Air Force to study the feasibility of increasing power and adding a data link capability for the Miniature Air Launched Decoy-Jammer (MALD-J). The contract requires Raytheon to integrate a data link and more powerful jammer amplifiers into the baseline MALD/MALD-J vehicle.
